'''Olin''' was a [[Dwarves|Dwarf]] from [[Thorin's Halls|Thorin's Hall]] created for ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]''.

When the [[Durin's Folk|Longbeards]] left the [[Blue Mountains]], Olin and a small guard force were left at Thorin's Gate to protect [[Thorin's Halls|Thorin's Hall]] and report to [[Dáin Ironfoot|Dáin]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], Introduction, ''Intro: Guards of the Silver Deep''</ref> But [[Gormr Doursmith]], Steward of the Dourhands, poisoned Olin and killed his men and left him in the Silver Deep Guard House to die.<ref name="Deeds">[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], Introduction, ''Gormr's Deeds''</ref> 

Finally, in {{TA|3016}}, a company of Dwarves from [[Lonely Mountain|Erebor]] arrived at Thorin's Gate and the Dwarf player healed Olin with some mushrooms named ''Nestadalas''.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], Introduction, ''Silver-lined Cure''</ref> When Dwalin, leader of the company, learnt of the [[Dourhands]] treason they were finally driven out of Thorin's Hall.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], Introduction, ''Skorgrim's Tomb''</ref>
